zh: 汤姆粗鲁的回话惹得玛丽扇了他一巴掌。

en: For me, there's nothing more fun to do than to talk with Tom.
zh: 对我来说，没有比跟汤姆聊天更开心的事了。

en: In my opinion, Tom is just a fool.
zh: 在我看来，汤姆就是个傻瓜。

en: Tom's request is very reasonable.
Our school has accepted three Canadians as exchange students.
zh: 我们学校接收了三名加拿大交换生。

en: Our school accepted three Canadians as exchange students.
zh: 我们学校接收了三名加拿大交换生。

en: Unfortunately, none of my Japanese friends are learning German, but one of them is learning Russian.
zh: 可惜我的日本朋友里没人学德语，但有一个在学俄语。

en: I am you.
You came by car, right?
We waited a long time, but Tom didn't show up.
zh: 我们等了很久，但汤姆没出现。

en: I'd like to tell Mary that I love her.
I'd like to tell Mary I love her.
With the exception of Tom, nobody else came to the party.
zh: 除了汤姆，没别人来参加聚会。

en: Tom was the only one who came to the party.
zh: 只有汤姆一个人来参加了聚会。

en: I wonder who the people I saw Tom with were.
zh: 我很好奇我看见的那些跟汤姆在一起的人是谁。

en: They discussed Tom's proposals at the meeting.
zh: 他们在会上讨论了汤姆的提议。

en: We waited a long time, but Tom never showed up again.
zh: 我们等了很久，但汤姆再也没出现过。

en: It's possible that Tom came here when he was young.
zh: 汤姆可能小时候来过这儿。

en: It's possible Tom came here when he was young.
zh: 汤姆可能小时候来过这儿。

en: Tom's goal is to become a teacher.
zh: 汤姆的目标是当一名老师。

en: Although Tom lives nearby, I rarely see him.
zh: 虽然汤姆住得近，但我很少见到他。

en: Even though Tom lives nearby, I hardly ever see him.
zh: 尽管汤姆就住在附近，但我几乎见不到他。

en: Tom's mother is a wonderful pianist.
zh: 汤姆的妈妈是一位很棒的钢琴家。

en: I want to send Tom a present for his birthday.
zh: 我想送汤姆一份生日礼物。

en: Are you going to bed for today?
"You invited Tom to the amusement park, didn't you? What did he say?" "That he can't because he's busy. He's no fun."
zh: “你邀请汤姆去游乐园了吧？他怎么说？”“他说他很忙去不了。他这人真没劲。”

en: Almost no one showed up at my new club's first meeting. But I'm not worried, since it'll all work out somehow.
zh: 我新社团的第一次活动几乎没人来。但我并不担心，反正总会有办法的。

en: Tom didn't open the door for me.
I can't believe I fought with Tom over something so stupid! God, I feel sick to my stomach.
zh: 我真不敢相信我竟然为了这么蠢的事跟汤姆吵架！天呐，我难受得想吐。

en: My salary increased in February.
I've been learning French for three years, and I still haven't even memorized the days of the week.
zh: 我学了三年法语，到现在连星期几都还没背下来。

en: Until Tom comes, I can't go.
Can I ask another question?
Can I say it in French?
After Tom's family moved to Australia, he started wetting the bed again.
zh: 汤姆一家搬到澳大利亚之后，他又开始尿床了。

en: What did you do with Tom's clothes?
zh: 你把汤姆的衣服弄哪去了？

en: Are you still studying French every day?
zh: 你现在还每天学法语吗？

en: Tom's house is near the sea.
What has Tom done today?
Tom asked him some questions.
Tom eats nothing but vegetables.
zh: 汤姆除了蔬菜什么都不吃。

en: Tom is proud of his country.
zh: 汤姆为他的国家感到自豪。

en: Japanese is hard, isn't it?
Japanese is hard.
Japanese is hard, don't you think?
I know this isn't an adequate answer to your question, but it's what I'll say for now.
zh: 我知道这可能没法完全回答你的问题，但我目前只能先这么说了。

en: French is hard, don't you think?
French is difficult, don't you think?
zh: 法语挺难的，你不觉得吗？

en: French is hard.
Use this if you're in danger.
zh: 遇到危险的时候就用这个。

en: I take off my shoes when I go in my house.
zh: 我进家门的时候会脱鞋。

en: You don't need to be scared.
We take off our shoes when entering a house.
zh: 进屋的时候我们要脱鞋。

en: We take our shoes off when entering a house.
zh: 进屋时我们会把鞋脱掉。

en: I think they're a little too small for you.
zh: 我觉得这双对你来说有点太小了。

en: What was that teacher's name? For some reason I can't remember.
zh: 那个老师叫什么来着？我怎么也想不起来了。

en: Spit it out now. You're going to swallow it.
zh: 快吐出来，不然你要咽下去了。

en: Those two make such a cute couple.
Those two are such a cute couple.
zh: 他们两个真是一对可爱的小情侣。

en: I think you should ask Tom that. He's better at French than I am.
zh: 我觉得你应该去问汤姆，他的法语比我好。

en: We're looking for our cat.
Tom didn't eat his fries.
Tom went to get Mary some water.
We haven't changed our plans.
Tom didn't let me do what I wanted to do.
zh: 汤姆不让我做我想做的事。

en: Don't forget to shut the door.
Green tea goes right through me.
zh: 我一喝绿茶就想上厕所。

en: Coffee goes right through me.
zh: 我一喝咖啡就想跑厕所。

en: This really suits you.
Please show me your laptop.
zh: 给我看看你的笔记本电脑。

en: I'm afraid to do it.
Did you go there?
We named our oldest son after my grandfather.
zh: 我们大儿子的名字是随我爷爷起的。

en: You always wear a ponytail. Why not try pigtails every now and then?
zh: 你总是扎个马尾，怎么不偶尔试试扎两个小辫子呢？

en: You always wear a ponytail. Why not try pigtails once in a while?
zh: 你老是扎马尾，偶尔也试试扎两个辫子呗？

en: Can you open this?
I'll go to school at seven.
Don't tell Mom.
Her only son died in the war.
zh: 她唯一的儿子死在了战争中。

en: I'm tired of games.
Well yes, but actually no.
zh: 说是也是，但其实也不是。

en: I gave up looking for a bathroom, and ran behind a tree in the nick of time.
zh: 我找不着厕所干脆放弃了，紧要关头赶紧钻到了树后边。
